name: Space Scape (Betogarcia)
description:
--Part of the Specialization Program in Game Design and Development by the MSU--

In this game you have to take control of a spaceship that is escaping from an alien galaxy, you have to defeat a certain amount of enemies in order to get to the next level, and eventually kill the final boss to sucessfully scape.

Controls:

  • -WASD keys to move around the level.
  • Esc key for pausing the game.
  • -Mouse to move the aim around.
  • -Left click to shoot and defeat all the enemies!

Modifications:

Form its original base I made the following modifications:

  • Adjustment the speed for chaser enemies to increase the difficulty of the game.
  • Addition of a health bar and remaining lifes indicator.
  • Changes on the color and distribution of the UI (all menus)
  • Creation of three distinc levels with different kind of enemies, backgrounds and music.
  • Creation of a final boss mechanic, including its health bar.
  • Remaining enemies indicator added.

Thanks for reading and have fun playing!
